name: Haze Heaven
description: Bred by Soma Seeds, Haze Heaven is a 60/40 indica-dominant hybrid whose classic genetics derive from Northern Lights #5, Haze, Afghani, and Hawaiian. Its heritage equips this strain with diverse qualities that appease the connoisseur as well as the commercial grower; large buds packed with resin show off Haze Heaven's indica dominance, but the buzzing energy expected from Haze hybrids is still present alongside mellow, relaxing effects. Hints of musk and spice can be detected on the inhale, balancing flavors from both indica and sativa sides of the family. This variety still takes about 10 to 11 weeks to finish flowering, but growers with enough skill to successfully cultivate Haze Heaven are typically rewarded with generous yields.
descriptionPlain: Bred by Soma Seeds, Haze Heaven is a 60/40 indica-dominant hybrid whose classic genetics derive from Northern Lights #5, Haze, Afghani, and Hawaiian. Its heritage equips this strain with diverse qualities that appease the connoisseur as well as the commercial grower; large buds packed with resin show off Haze Heaven's indica dominance, but the buzzing energy expected from Haze hybrids is still present alongside mellow, relaxing effects. Hints of musk and spice can be detected on the inhale, balancing flavors from both indica and sativa sides of the family. This variety still takes about 10 to 11 weeks to finish flowering, but growers with enough skill to successfully cultivate Haze Heaven are typically rewarded with generous yields.

highlightedReviews.text:
Haze Heaven Shatter
Look: Soft almost runny looking,but completly stable. Dark amber turns to a transparent yellow when "snaked" a little bit.
Smell/Taste: This was a really non distinct smell and taste. Its dank and pungent, but doesnt really resemble anything. I feel like haze and its hybrids have a lemon-catpiss flavor spectrum alot of times, and if it falls inbetween instead of peaning one side,it can almost seem flavorless. Not one id goto for flavor again.
Effects: I was really happy, im wary of indica dominant  haze strains, but this one deoivers the classic haze energy boost along with a nice relaxing body high and a fairly focused mindset, along with a happy mood.
I would recommend this if you dont care much about taste and want a good mid day stress/pain reliver.
I am absolutely happy with relieving my pain as I can barely get around #excited

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Blue Heron, Haze Heaven, Grimace, Garlic Bud, and Nurse Jackie
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
New strains are here, and many more are on the way! Using the Leafly app, it's now possible to nominate strains for inclusion in the Explorer. Simply enter the strain into the search bar on the "Explore Strains" page, and if no results surface, you'll be given the option to submit this variety. Keep in mind that we won't be able to tend to all requests, but we'll do what we can to make it happen as long as we can still eat, sleep, and go home every once in while.
   1. Blue Heron
Characteristics of Blue Heron:

Indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Blue Magoo and Huckleberry
Breeder: Dynasty Seeds
Blueberry, rose, and citrus aroma
Flowering time of 8 to 9 weeks

   2. Haze Heaven
Characteristics of Haze Heaven:

60/40 indica-domintant hybrid
Cross between Northern Lights #5, Haze, Afghani, and Hawaiian
Breeder: Soma Seeds
Musky, spicy aroma
Buzzing cerebral energy paired with mellow, relaxing body effects
Flowering time of 10 to 11 weeks

   3. Grimace
Characteristics of Grimace: 

Mostly indica strain
Unknown genetics
Sedating, mellow effects
Grows into large, conic, purple buds (that may or may not look just like this off-putting fast-food mascot)

   4. Garlic Bud
Characteristics of Garlic Bud:

Mostly indica strain
Bred using Afghani genetics
Breeder: The Seed Bank (now Sensi Seeds)
Pungent spicy, musky aroma
Relaxing body effects coupled with an invigorating cerebral buzz
Flowering time of 7 to 8 weeks

   5. Nurse Jackie
Characteristics of Nurse Jackie:

85/15 sativa-dominant strain
Cross between Jack the Ripper and Medicine Woman
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Sour citrus aroma
Clear-headed, functional buzz
